name: Voxcitio Places
description: Voxcitio Places allows consultation teams to talk to citizens directly on the street or at locations. In the field, at events, on the street or at meetings, Voxcitio Places can capture survey responses and personal information instantly and sync it back to a central dashboard. Our mobile app allows you to do surveys, polling, note down specific issues, and even capture consent from citizens to contact them further. Saving you time and money on stakeholder outreach, Voxcitio Places, gives consultation teams a great way to gather data.
